original_text: a morose little soap opera about three vapid , insensitive people who take turns hurting each other . it's a feature-length adaptation of one of those " can this marriage be saved ? " columns from ladies home journal . . .
generated_text:
1. "A shallow exploration of the lives of three self-absorbed individuals who consistently prioritize their own desires over the well-being of others. A cinematic embodiment of a tabloid headline."
2. "A tedious and emotionally draining portrayal of three individuals who lack empathy and compassion, only to be rewarded with more misery. A perfect representation of the phrase 'drama for the sake of drama'."
3. "A soulless, over-the-top drama about three people who are more concerned with their own problems than with resolving their issues. A cinematic equivalent of a gossip column."
4. "A miserable, shallow, and unengaging exploration of the lives of three individuals who consistently prioritize their own interests over the well-being of those around them. A cinematic embodiment of a tabloid headline."
